languages.text: If the Soldier attacks before using {g|f:7a76af1ef02c4699b62db147e2b9a172}Run and Gun{/g}, their next attack after its use gains +3% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} for each cell between the Soldier's position at the moment of the attack before using {g|f:7a76af1ef02c4699b62db147e2b9a172}Run and Gun{/g} and their position at the moment of the next attack after use.
languages.original_text: Если солдат совершает атаку перед Стрельбой на бегу, его следующая атака после применения этой способности получает +3% к шансу {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критического попадания{/g} за каждую клетку между точками совершения атак до и после Стрельбы на бегу.

traits.locale_text: If the Marksman attacks before using Shot on the Run, their next attack after use gains +3% critical hit chance for each cell between the Marksman's position at the moment of the attack before using Shot on the Run and their position at the moment of the next attack after use.

If the Marksman attacks before using Shot on the Run, their next attack after its use gains +3% critical hit chance for each cell between the Marksman's position at the moment of the attack before using Shot on the Run and their position at the moment of the next attack after use.

If the Soldier attacks before using Run and Gun, their next attack after its use gains +3% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} for each cell between the Soldier's position at the moment of the attack before using Run and Gun and their position at the moment of the next attack after use.

If the Soldier attacks before using Run and Gun, their next attack after its use gains +3% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} for each cell between the Soldier's position at the moment of the attack before using Run and Gun and their position at the moment of the next attack after use.

languages.text: Если солдат совершает атаку перед {g|f:7a76af1ef02c4699b62db147e2b9a172}Стрельбой на бегу{/g}, его следующая атака после применения этой способности получает +3% к шансу {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критического попадания{/g} за каждую клетку между точками совершения атак до и после {g|f:7a76af1ef02c4699b62db147e2b9a172}Стрельбы на бегу{/g}.
languages.original_text: If the Soldier attacks before using {g|f:7a76af1ef02c4699b62db147e2b9a172}Run and Gun{/g}, their next attack after its use gains +3% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} for each cell between the Soldier's position at the moment of the attack before using {g|f:7a76af1ef02c4699b62db147e2b9a172}Run and Gun{/g} and their position at the moment of the next attack after use.

traits.locale_text: Если солдат совершает атаку перед {g|f:7a76af1ef02c4699b62db147e2b9a172}Стрельбой на бегу{/g}, его следующая атака после применения этой способности получает +3% к шансу {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критического попадания{/g} за каждую клетку между точками совершения атак до и после {g|f:7a76af1ef02c4699b62db147e2b9a172}Стрельбы на бегу{/g}.

Если стрелок совершает атаку перед Стрельбой на бегу, его следующая атака после применения этой способности получает +3% к шансу критического попадания за каждую клетку между точками совершения атак до и после Стрельбы на бегу.

languages.text: 如果士兵在使用{g|f:7a76af1ef02c4699b62db147e2b9a172}奔袭射击{/g}之前进行过攻击，则使用{g|f:7a76af1ef02c4699b62db147e2b9a172}奔袭射击{/g}之后的下次攻击会获得{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击率{/g}加成。两次攻击位置每相距1格，都会使第二次攻击获得+3%暴击率加成。
languages.original_text: If the Soldier attacks before using {g|f:7a76af1ef02c4699b62db147e2b9a172}Run and Gun{/g}, their next attack after its use gains +3% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} for each cell between the Soldier's position at the moment of the attack before using {g|f:7a76af1ef02c4699b62db147e2b9a172}Run and Gun{/g} and their position at the moment of the next attack after use.

traits.locale_text: 如果士兵在使用奔袭射击之前进行过攻击，则使用奔袭射击之后的下次攻击会获得{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击率{/g}加成。两次攻击位置每相距1格，都会使第二次攻击获得+3%暴击率加成。

languages.text: Si el soldado ataca antes de usar {g|f:7a76af1ef02c4699b62db147e2b9a172}Disparo a la carrera{/g}, su siguiente ataque tras su uso gana un +3 % de probabilidades de {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}impacto crítico{/g} por cada casilla que haya entre la posición del ataque previo al uso de Disparo a la carrera y la de su siguiente ataque tras su uso.
languages.original_text: If the Soldier attacks before using {g|f:7a76af1ef02c4699b62db147e2b9a172}Run and Gun{/g}, their next attack after its use gains +3% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} for each cell between the Soldier's position at the moment of the attack before using {g|f:7a76af1ef02c4699b62db147e2b9a172}Run and Gun{/g} and their position at the moment of the next attack after use.

traits.locale_text: Si el tirador de élite ataca antes de usar Disparo a la carrera, su siguiente ataque tras su uso gana un +3 % de probabilidades de {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}impacto crítico{/g} por cada casilla que haya entre la posición del ataque previo al uso de Disparo a la carrera y la de su siguiente ataque tras su uso.

languages.text: Wenn der Soldat angreift, bevor er {g|f:7a76af1ef02c4699b62db147e2b9a172}Laufen und ballern{/g} einsetzt, wird die {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritische Trefferchance{/g} des nächsten Angriffs pro Feld, das zwischen der Position des Soldaten zum Zeitpunkt des Angriffs vor dem Einsatz von {g|f:7a76af1ef02c4699b62db147e2b9a172}Laufen und ballern{/g} und seiner Position beim nächsten Angriff nach dem Einsatz liegt, um +3 % erhöht.
languages.original_text: If the Soldier attacks before using {g|f:7a76af1ef02c4699b62db147e2b9a172}Run and Gun{/g}, their next attack after its use gains +3% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} for each cell between the Soldier's position at the moment of the attack before using {g|f:7a76af1ef02c4699b62db147e2b9a172}Run and Gun{/g} and their position at the moment of the next attack after use.

traits.locale_text: Wenn der Scharfschütze angreift, bevor er Laufen und ballern nutzt, wird die {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritische Trefferchance{/g} nach jedem Angriff um +3 % erhöht, und zwar pro Feld zwischen der Position des Scharfschützen zum Zeitpunkt des Angriffs, bevor er Laufen und ballern nutzt, und seiner Position beim nächsten Angriff nach der Nutzung.

languages.text: Si le soldat attaque avant d'utiliser {g|f:7a76af1ef02c4699b62db147e2b9a172}Tir à la volée{/g}, l'attaque qui suit cette utilisation a +3 % de {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}chances de coup critique{/g} sur chaque case située entre la position du soldat au moment de l'attaque précédant l'utilisation de {g|f:7a76af1ef02c4699b62db147e2b9a172}Tir à la volée{/g} et sa position au moment de l'attaque suivant son utilisation.
languages.original_text: If the Soldier attacks before using {g|f:7a76af1ef02c4699b62db147e2b9a172}Run and Gun{/g}, their next attack after its use gains +3% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} for each cell between the Soldier's position at the moment of the attack before using {g|f:7a76af1ef02c4699b62db147e2b9a172}Run and Gun{/g} and their position at the moment of the next attack after use.

traits.locale_text: Si le Tireur d'Élite attaque avant d'utiliser Tir en Courant, l'attaque qui suit cette utilisation a +3 % de chances d'infliger un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}coup critique{/g} sur chaque case située entre la position du Tireur d'Élite au moment de l'attaque précédant l'utilisation de Tir en Courant et sa position au moment de l'attaque qui suit son utilisation.

Si le Soldat attaque avant d'utiliser Tir à la volée, l'attaque qui suit cette utilisation a +3 % de {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}chances d'infliger un coup critique{/g} sur chaque case située entre la position du Soldat au moment de l'attaque précédant l'utilisation de Tir à la volée et sa position au moment de l'attaque qui suit son utilisation.

languages.text: ラン＆ガンを使用する前に兵士が攻撃した場合、使用後の次の攻撃は、ラン＆ガンを使用する前の攻撃時の位置と、使用後の攻撃時の位置の間のセル1つにつき、{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルヒット{/g}率が+3%される。
languages.original_text: If the Soldier attacks before using Run and Gun, their next attack after its use gains +3% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} for each cell between the Soldier's position at the moment of the attack before using Run and Gun and their position at the moment of the next attack after use.

traits.locale_text: ラン＆ガンを使用する前に兵士が攻撃した場合、使用後の次の攻撃は、ラン＆ガンを使用する前の攻撃時の位置と、使用後の攻撃時の位置の間のセル1つにつき、{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルヒット{/g}率が+3%される。

languages.text: Asker, {g|f:7a76af1ef02c4699b62db147e2b9a172}Fırla ve Mıhla{/g} kabiliyetini kullanmadan önce saldırırsa bir sonraki saldırısının {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritik vuruş olasılığı{/g}, Asker'in {g|f:7a76af1ef02c4699b62db147e2b9a172}Fırla ve Mıhla{/g} kullanmadan önceki saldırı anındaki konumuyla kullandıktan sonraki saldırı anındaki konumu arasındaki her hücre için +%3 artar.
languages.original_text: If the Soldier attacks before using {g|f:7a76af1ef02c4699b62db147e2b9a172}Run and Gun{/g}, their next attack after its use gains +3% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} for each cell between the Soldier's position at the moment of the attack before using {g|f:7a76af1ef02c4699b62db147e2b9a172}Run and Gun{/g} and their position at the moment of the next attack after use.
